summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; making an appropriation from the Sewer Improvement Fund for preconstruction activities on the LAKE UNION SOUTH SEWER Separation project; and abandoning unencumbered Sewer Improvement Funds set aside in the 1986 Sewer CIP for the Harrison Street Tunnel Separation, Unit 1, Contract 2 project; and the Lake Washington NORTH CSO SEWER SEPARATION PROJECT.
